review: love it so far. I had a ruku but it kept losing connection. plus amazon knows how to pack their products cause the box it came in looks great. I couldnt throw it away. thanx amazon.
author: agent cooper

review: I thought there would be more recent movies available for free.  I was disappointed that they 2-3 year old movies had a "purchase" cost associated with them rather than the "prime" customer use for free as I was lead to believe when purchasing this device.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I like it, works very well and easy to set up
author: Ashley Wiggins

review: I have this. Ordered it before released so was a good price in advance (about $20.)Easy to use. Enjoy having choices of movies, series, tv shows.I got rid of cable tv and now use the fire stick.
author: NancyC "Nanc"

review: Great product just what we wanted
author: Bryan Peterson

review: Been using a jailbroke Apple TV 2 for past 4 years or so and this thing blows it out of the water in speed and functionality.  Load Kodi ( XBMC) on it and this thing is amazing. Using the  Slingplayer app is like having another DVR in the bedroom.
author: Elizabeth

review: Fantastic it's clearer than,Cox cable that I have contour on with 6 programs and the newest box by ushering this web tv,as I call it its great we have Googlec crome I wish a option was the talk to clicker but it's notv
author: Michael Kelleher
